AU_MAPPINGTRANSFORMATION.au_xslFile: <?xml version='1.0'?> <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.1" xmlns:saxonJavaMappingTransformation="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.MappingTransformation" xmlns:saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.support.dbquery.MapperQueryExecutor" xmlns:saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler="java:com.adeptia.indigo.services.mapping.AggregateFunctionHandler" xmlns:str="http://exslt.org/strings" exclude-result-prefixes="saxonJavaMappingTransformation saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor saxonJavaAggregateFunctionHandler str" xmlns:saxon="http://saxon.sf.net/" extension-element-prefixes="saxon"> <xsl:output method="xml" version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" cdata-section-elements="" indent="yes" /><xsl:param name="_userName"/><xsl:param name="_password"/><xsl:param name="_class"/><xsl:param name="_identifier"/><xsl:param name="_subject"/><xsl:param name="_repositoryPath"/><xsl:param name="_Input1"/> <xsl:variable name="varConn" select="saxonJavaMapperQueryExecutor:getInstance($_identifier,'false')"/> <xsl:variable name="apos">'</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="quot">"</xsl:variable><xsl:key name="Drv_KeyFuntion1" match="Root/Record" use="NAME" /><xsl:template match="/"> <!--Global PreCustom XSL starting--><xsl:for-each select = "."> <!--Global PreCustom XSL ending--><Root><Record><xsl:attribute name="recordNumber"></xsl:attribute><NAME><xsl:value-of select="key( 'Drv_KeyFuntion1','Vishal' )/FIRST"/></NAME><SEX><xsl:value-of select="Root/Record/SEX"/></SEX><AGE></AGE><CITY></CITY><FIRST></FIRST><LAST></LAST><GENDER></GENDER><SCHOOL></SCHOOL><STATE></STATE><COUNTRY></COUNTRY><LOCATION></LOCATION><MARRIED></MARRIED><ADDRESS></ADDRESS><STATION></STATION><DATEOFBIRTH></DATEOFBIRTH><HOSPITALNAME></HOSPITALNAME><HOBBIES></HOBBIES></Record></Root> <!--Global PostCustom XSL starting--></xsl:for-each> <!--Global PostCustom XSL ending--></xsl:template></xsl:stylesheet>
